recommendations: Vikas Chandra “Shreya and I studied together at NITIE Mumbai where we participated in many group activities and case studies. Shreya is very detailed oriented and hardworking individual who has special interest in looking at big picture and then delve into minute details. She is also very analytical and result oriented and Is never afraid to try new methods to solve problems on hand. Any organization will be lucky to have her as an employee.”

Shivam Rawat “When it comes to challenging Status Quos, driving innovation, thriving change OR being disruptive - I can only think of one person in procurement and that's Shreya. A great team player, awesome at work with full of positive energy and excellent workmen ship - She is an asset to any team, organization OR function. Multi talented procurement professional with exceptional stakeholder management. A must have in your team kinda member.”

honors_and_awards.title: Select- Young India Fellowship
honors_and_awards.description: Was offered a full academic scholarship to the prestigious YIF program, which is a Liberal Arts programme that trains youth across subjects like Psychology, History, Economics, Sociology, and a plethora of diverse areas etc to become multidisciplinary generalists capable of confidently taking up any problem, connecting the dots and solving them holistically.
